title: Add functions to cache data structures and mathematical models
description: Currently when mathematical models and data structures are created with math expressions they must be used within the same expression. This ticket will create a set of functions that allow for caching of mathematical models and data structures for use in subsequent expressions.

comments.content:
Initial patch with implementations for four caching functions: 

putCache: Adds a value to a cache given a workspace, key and value

getCache: Returns a value from a cache given a workspace and key

removeCache: Removes a value from a cache given a workspace and key

listCache: Lists the workspaces and values in a workspace
comments.author: Joel Bernstein
